contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} '''Lynnwood''' is a place located in [[Fayette County, Pennsylvania]] in the [[United States|United States of America]]. Its latitude is 40°7'27" [[North]], longitude 79°50'37" [[West]]. ==Midget League Football== Lynnwood was home to the now defunct Lynnwood Eagles. The Eagles were a part of the Belle Vernon Midget Football League. Their last league title came in 1998 under a team led by local legend Rick Van Pool. {{Coord|40|07|27|N|79|50|36|W|type:city_region:US-PA|display=title}} [[Category:Geography of Fayette County, Pennsylvania]] {{FayettePA-geo-stub}}
